actions.recommendation: High cholesterol - try to reduce through dietary changes, rychol and omega 3 supplementation but consider medication if not reducing.

Your homocysteine is higher than ideal at 12umol/l. You can reduce this by supplementing with methylated B vitamins. Please take Stellar Activ-Folate/Metagenics MethylCare & recheck the level in 6 months. Aim for <7 umol/l.

A waist to height ratio of more than 50% is associated with a significantly increased risk for chronic disease and adverse cardiovascular events. Focus on losing cm around the waist rather than the kg on the scale for improved health.
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear
